job.title: Applied Data Scientist

job.description: pstrongemDo you want to be a part of a new amp growing team for one of the top overseas ECommerce companies in the world With a 37 billion company valuation and Walmart as its primary stakeholder this Fulltime PreIpo company is a highly sought out opportunity for Data Scientists looking to join a new highvisibility team for a lucrative overseas brand that is starting its roots here in Seattle Washington Come be a part of a collaborative team that celebrates flexibility and employee growthemstrongppbrppstronguAbout the RoleustrongppbrppOne of the areas of research in the US will be natural language bots making it easier for shoppers to find products quickly and get answers to their product and customer questionsppbrppData Science techniques adopted span classification regression clustering matrix factorization graphical model treebased models network and graph algorithms topic modeling image processing deep learning and NLP  each one of them being applied across large scale initiativesppbrppIf you aspire to redefine stateoftheart and create an impact in the online shopping landscape this Data Science team can offer you the right podium to solve challenging realworld problems and take a giant leap in your career as a Data ScientistppbrppstronguWhat Youll BringustrongppbrppA Masters degree in Computer Science Math Physics Operations Research or equivalent frameworks such as Tensorflow Keras Pytorchppbrpp Able to write productionlevel code which is wellwritten and explainable  Deep experience with Pythonppbrpp Familiarity with data visualization toolsppbrpp Experience using ML librariesppbrppstronguBenefitsustrongppbrpp Lucrative Total compensation in addition to exclusive stock options and competitive bonusesppbrpp PreIPO opportunity for a multibilliondollar valuated companyppbrpp Flexibility and autonomy to take lead on highvisibility NLP projectsppbrpp Great growth opportunities for a new amp developing teamppbrpp Full Medical Dental amp Vision benefitsp
